game.name: Rainbow Unicorn Dash
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Leaderboards
game.shortDescription: Collect your unicorn shoes to dash through enemies, gather hearts, unlock fun abilities, and climb the leaderboards!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Collect your unicorn shoes to dash through enemies, gather hearts, unlock fun abilities, and climb the leaderboards!
